import React from 'react' import { Card, Icon, Grid, Image, List} from 'semantic-ui-react' import {BsFillLightningFill} from "react-icons/bs" import {FaHandsHelping} from "react-icons/fa" const GroupsCard = (props) => { return( {props.header} {props.groups.map(group => { {group.name} })} ); } export default GroupsCard; // // // {/* {props.post.author.first_name + " " + props.post.author.last_name} {"Posted in " + props.post.group.name}

{props.post.content}



} /> } /> } /> */}
